author: boudoul
body:
Backport of #25137
Updating runthematrix cosmic WFs with the latest and greatest 2018 Cosmic GTs
The corresponding WFs are 7.2 , 7.3, 7.4

This PR is also backporting #25249 and #25276 to be fully in synch with 10_4 X (adding 2017-2016)
The corresponding WFs are 7.21 , 7.22
Thanks @lpernie for having provided the GTs

@mmusich @tsusa FYI
title: Moving to 2018 Cosmic WFs and Re-adding 2016-2017 Cosmic WFs (10_2_X)
